name: Early Parrot
shortDes: EarlyParrot is a SaaS referral marketing platform from Malta that includes marketing automation tools, tracking and analytics features.
descriptions: Customize UI according to requirements using AngularJS, Bootstrap.
Develop a feature to support clients in tracking their referral numbers.
Create a scheduler job that uses Agenda to synchronize data from 3rd Integration Apps.
Deploy source code to Development environment using PM2.

name: Iyyara & Halalfoodhunt
shortDes: Iyyara & Halalfoodhunt is an app from Singapore that verifies halal food options (eateries, online businesses, food vendors, etc.) before publishing them.
descriptions: Develop API for a new module using ExpressJS and Prisma.
Ensure project integrity with thorough testing and ongoing maintenance.
Configure Gitlab CI/CD to deploy the product to staging and production environments using Docker.
Schedule the database backup that uses a containerized Shell Script service, using Docker.

name: Mark Platform
shortDes: The Mark Platform is a review and discovery platform for interior designers in Singapore.
descriptions: Create middleware to dynamically authorize user roles.
Use FastAPI to develop APIs and test it with Pytest.
Integrate Stripe payment APIs into the subscription system.
Configure Gitlab CI/CD for automatic deployment using Docker on a DigitalOcean Droplet.
Set up zero downtime deployment for the system using Docker Compose and Nginx.
